name: Agnimurka
description:
Agnimurka is a 2d top-down action boss-slaying game like Shadow of Colossus and Titan Souls, where you sacrifice your own life force to defeat Agnimurka, an evil being that consumes everything to become an absolute entity

-- Objective --
- Defeat the boss by shooting at the weakpoint
- You need to reload before shooting by sacrificing your life force

-- Button --
Move : WASD
Dialogue Interaction : E
Shoot : Left Mouse Button
Dash : Space
Reload : R
